attributes.action: pass the NHS cost of ambulances and care for drunken yobs scraped off the pavements to them or their parents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have, in our home, had need of a late night ambulance for my wife, she was very upset at needing the service, but was reassured by the crew who said the last seven jobs they had attended were all legless drunks.
